技师，技术员；技巧纯熟的人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指具体的某种技术和技巧。
含义比technique广泛，泛指生产工艺、科学技术。

bilingual.target: 他使用最新的计算机技术。
计算机技术控制它的“腿”。

bilingual.source: Exploring space encourages scientists to improve technology.
bilingual.target: 探索太空鼓励科学家改进技术。

bilingual.source: Science and technology might help us to prevent disasters.
bilingual.target: 科学和技术可能会帮助我们预防灾难。

bilingual.source: They were amazed by the up to date technology this phone had.
bilingual.target: 他们对这款手机的最新技术感到惊讶。

bilingual.source: It's unbelievable that technology has progressed in such a rapid way!
bilingual.target: 技术进步得如此之快，真是难以置信！

bilingual.source: And now, we find ourselves in the great new age of technology.
bilingual.target: 现在，我们发现自己处于伟大的新技术时代。

bilingual.source: It is capable of using GPS technology to travel to different places.
bilingual.target: 它能够使用GPS技术到不同的地方旅行。

bilingual.source: It's a new piece of technology that records how many steps you walk each day.
bilingual.target: 这是一个记录你每天走多少步的新技术。

bilingual.source: This is a type of new technology.

list.abstract: Technology（英 [tekˈnɒlədʒi]，美 [tekˈnɑːlədʒi]），英文单词，名词。释义为技术；工艺；工业技术。短语搭配为“high technology（高科技）”，例句为“Gains of technology have been erased.（技术的成就被抹去了。）” Technology近义词为science，mechanics。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, their technology isn't that bad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们的技术也没那么糟啦。

yingyinNormal.en: OK, so let's see how this technology works.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，让我们看看这个技术是怎么运作的。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, I'm using the technology to destroy people's trust in it. Like I'm using superheroes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在利用这项技术来毁灭人们对技术的信任。就像我在利用超级英雄。

yingyinNormal.en: Customers have to pay a premium to make up for the cost of installing the technology.
yingyinNormal.zh: 居民要花额外费用引进技术。

yingyinNormal.en: IT technology and digital technology, is not the technology difference, is the difference of the way people think, the way people deal with the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: IT科技和数字科技，这不仅仅是不同的技术，而是人们思考方式的不同，人们对待这个世界方式的不同。

yingyinNormal.en: Who was this captain? The Great Sentinel Prime. The technology's inventor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 机长是谁？伟大的帮主，御天敌，发明这项技术的人。

yingyinNormal.en: In medicine or economics, in technology or space, battle lines are being drawn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无论在医药还是经济上，在科技或太空技术上，战线已经分明了。

yingyinNormal.en: It was carrying an Autobot technology which would have won us the war. And its captain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 里面搭载着一项汽车人技术能让我们赢得战争，里面还有机长。

yingyinNormal.en: So, the food industry turned to a new technology based on genetics rather than chemistry, the genetically modified organism, better known as the GMO.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此,食品产业发明出了一项新技术它的基础是基因技术而不是化学转基因生物其中比较出名的是基因改造生物。

yingyinNormal.en: Without modern materials and technology, the ancients triumphed turning nature to their advantage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 并未假以现代材料和技术，古人就能充分利用并战胜自然。

yingyinNormal.en: I won't say that all senior citizens who can't master technology should be publicly flogged.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能说所有无法掌握当代技术的老年人就应该被当众鞭策一番。

yingyinNormal.en: But unlike Edison, we've got some very impressive technology these days to help with the search.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但和爱迪生不同的是，如今我们有了很专业的技术以帮助寻找能源。

yingyinNormal.en: If the first and the second innovation and technology revolution relief(release) or liberate the human strength, the physical strength, this revolution release and liberate the strength of human brain, the brain in innovation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果第一次和第二次技术革命释放了人的体力，那这次技术革命释放了人的脑力，脑力在革新。

yingyinNormal.en: The outer colonies would never have flourished had he not bought Tyrell revivified the technology.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他的公司发展的不怎么样直到他收购了泰勒公司这使得复制人技术获得新生。

yingyinNormal.en: We split the drilling rights? Yes, sir. China puts in more money, but we contribute our drilling technology.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们割让了开采权吗？是的，先生，中国出了更多钱，我们就拿出我们的开采技术。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you imagine what Mr. Free Enterprise would do with my hypnosis technology? Worse than what you're doing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能想象这位自由企业家会用我的催眠技术干出什么勾当吗？比你现在做的事更坏吗？

yingyinNormal.en: A human hair is 80 microns. One micron has 1,000 nanometers in it. We're printing here 32-nanometer technology.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人的头发是八十微米，一微米等于一千毫微米，我们现在正在复制三十二毫微米技术。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll cut to the chase. The Air Force believes there's an application for this technology, and we're interested in funding your research.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就不兜圈子了，美国空军想将这项技术投入到实际应用中，我们有兴趣投资你们的研究。

yingyinNormal.en: Where you took advantage of the advanced technology to build a time machine, and now you're back to bring us all with you to the year 7010.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后你在那里利用当时的先进技术造了一架时间机器，现在你是回来接我们去7010年。

yingyinNormal.en: Cyber attacks threaten those co-ventures. There's less a need for them if the Chinese can obtain new technology from corporate espionage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 网络攻击对那些合作企业构成威胁，如果中方可以通过商业间谍获取新技术，就不需要合作了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 科技; 工艺; 技术

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 科学和技术；科学技术；科学与技术
突破性科技；颠覆性技术

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 生物技术；生物工艺

word_family.mean: n. 技术；工艺；工业技术；设备；机器；技术学；工艺学

sense_info_list.en: a method of or machine for doing something that is created by technology
sense_info_list.zh: 科技; 工艺; 技术

examination_example.sentence: Today is no different, with academics, writers, and activists once again warning that <highlight>technology</highlight> is replacing human workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天也不例外，学者、作家和活动家再次警告说，技术正在取代人类工人。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Technology</highlight> is diminishing man's job opportunities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 技术正在减少人类的工作机会。

examination_example.sentence: Archaeologists also may locate buried remains by using such <highlight>technologies</highlight> as ground radar, magnetic-field recording, and metal detectors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考古学家还可以利用地面雷达、磁场记录和金属探测器等技术来定位被埋藏的遗迹。

examination_example.sentence: But when you can't connect in person, consider using <highlight>technology</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是当你不能面对面交流时，可以考虑使用科技手段。

word_usage.usage:
science and technology： 
science偏向理论知识，而technology偏向技术（实操）。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 构词类同biology（生物学），是“技术、工艺”在学术理论上的总称。
常指某种具体的技术、技艺。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 技术；工艺；工业技术；设备；机器；技术学；工艺学

sense_info_list.en: a method of or machine for doing something that is created by technology

examination_example.sentence: This is because the more <highlight>technology</highlight> is put into the field, the more people are needed to deploy, maintain and improve it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是因为投入到该领域的技术越多，就需要越多的人来部署、维护和改进它。

examination_example.sentence: In a second analysis, they found that where <highlight>technology</highlight> went, dips in wellbeing followed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在第二次分析中，他们发现，随着科技的发展，幸福感也随之下降。

examination_example.sentence: A number of pioneers from the <highlight>technology</highlight> industry have expressed their concerns about the damage that a super-intelligent AI could do to humanity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来自科技行业的许多先驱表达了他们对超级智能 AI 可能对人类造成的破坏的担忧。

examination_example.sentence: Agencies throughout the world are working on developing <highlight>technology</highlight> that would dispose of or capture space debris before it causes serious damage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全世界的许多机构都在致力于开发可以处理或捕获太空碎片的技术，以防止碎片造成严重损伤。

examination_example.sentence: A large proportion of the species is in continuous contact with <highlight>technology</highlight> that can record key features of an individual's behavior and environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很大一部分物种与可以记录个人行为和环境关键特征的技术持续接触。

examination_example.sentence: Often the advantages of convenient, mobile <highlight>technology</highlight> are both obvious and taken for granted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常便捷移动技术的优点是显而易见的并且理所当然的。

sense_info_list.en: the branch of knowledge dealing with engineering or applied sciences
machinery or equipment designed using technology

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 生物技术；生物工艺
n. 技术专家；工艺学家；工艺人员

word_family.mean: n. 技术；工艺；工业技术；设备；机器；技术学；工艺学

sense_info_list.en: a method of or machine for doing something that is created by technology

examination_example.sentence: In contrast, California, home of Silicon Valley, recently proposed far more restrictive rules that would require human drivers be ready to take the wheel, and commercial use of self-driving <highlight>technology</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相比之下，硅谷所在州加利福尼亚州最近提出了限制性更强的规则，要求驾驶员做好驾驶准备，并在商业上使用自动驾驶技术。

examination_example.sentence: Lawmakers in Michigan clearly want to make the state ready for the commercial application of self-driving <highlight>technology</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 密歇根州的立法者显然非常希望该州能为发展自动驾驶技术的商业化用途做好准备。

examination_example.sentence: Manufacturer would have nearly total freedom to test their self-driving <highlight>technology</highlight> on public roads.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制造商几乎可以完全自由地在公共道路上测试他们的自动驾驶技术。

examination_example.sentence: A new <highlight>technology</highlight> has the potential to change modern society in radical ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项新技术有可能以激进的方式改变现代社会。

examination_example.sentence: She also wants to explain that there are no right or wrong answers regarding manners on this front yet, because the <highlight>technology</highlight> is just now becoming mainstream.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她还想解释说，还没有关于这种方法的正确或错误答案，因为这项技术刚刚成为主流。

sense_info_list.en: machinery or equipment designed using technology

examination_example.sentence: We have seen a considerable increase in England in the number of women accepted on to full-time undergraduate degrees in science and <highlight>technology</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们看到英国接受全日制科学、技术本科学位的女性人数大幅增加。

sense_info_list.en: the branch of knowledge dealing with engineering or applied sciences

sample.mean: n. 技术员；专门技师；精于技巧者；巧匠

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 用作复合形式的末尾元音
名词后缀, 表学科, 学术, 字面意思为说话, 讨论, 理论, 科学

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 先进技术；高级技术；先进工艺

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 技术专家；工艺学家；工艺人员

word_family.mean: n. 技术；工艺；工业技术；设备；机器；技术学；工艺学

sense_info_list.en: a method of or machine for doing something that is created by technology

examination_example.sentence: As we develop more advanced Al <highlight>technology</highlight>, we would then have to use new ways of communicating with that <highlight>technology</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着我们开发更先进的人工智能技术，我们那时将不得不使用与那种技术交流的新方法。

examination_example.sentence: Modern <highlight>technology</highlight> may help to shape the rivers' temporal frame.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现代技术可能有助于塑造河流的时间框架。

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't require a new type of <highlight>technology</highlight> that people aren't already familiar with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不需要人们还不熟悉的新型技术。

sense_info_list.en: the branch of knowledge dealing with engineering or applied sciences

examination_example.sentence: Since 1962 Pacific Science Center has been inspiring a passion (热情) for discovery and lifelong learning in science, math and <highlight>technology</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自1962年以来，太平洋科学中心一直在激发人们对科学、数学和技术的探索和终生学习的热情。

sense_info_list.en: machinery or equipment designed using technology

examination_example.sentence: At present, these <highlight>technologies</highlight> are still expensive, though.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，目前这些技术仍然昂贵。

sense_info_list.en: a method of or machine for doing something that is created by technology

examination_example.sentence: The school offers two courses on computer <highlight>technology</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这所学校开设两门计算机技术课程。

examination_example.sentence: Facial detection <highlight>technology</highlight> may need some time before being widely used.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面部检测技术可能需要一段时间才能广泛应用。

examination_example.sentence: With the rapid progress in high <highlight>technology</highlight>, 5G will be used around most parts of China in the near future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着高科技的快速发展，在不久的将来，5G将在中国的大部分地区得到应用。
